item.description:
Hi everyone!

I've finally been able to coordinate with Lisa and Elizabeth at The Good Dog Spot. We're scheduling our next meetup for Saturday, February 21 at 10am.

In order to cover the cost of space rental, we'll need to charge $5/dog. I hope this will be feasible for people. If you aren't able to pay the $5, we would appreciate any amount you're able to contribute. And, especially because we'll need enough people to cover cost of the rental, if you RSVP "yes," please make every effort to attend!

I look forward to seeing some familiar faces and hopefully making some new friends as well!

Feel free to email me with questions.

All the best,
Marianna
(organizer)
item.name: February Meet-Up!
